title.rendered: Professional Aircraft Accessories Geared Up For Bombardier Challenger 604 Overhauls

content.rendered:
Professional Aircraft Accessories, a Greenwich AeroGroup company, has acquired the Messier-Bugatti-Dowty overhaul manuals and technical data for the 192-month landing gear refurbishments on the Bombardier Challenger 604.

“We are excited to add this capability to our already extensive list of aircraft landing gear,” said President of Professional Aircraft Accessories Robert Bial. “Our name has become synonymous with aftermarket landing gear service because first and foremost that is what we do.”

Professional Aircraft Accessories is in the midst of a 20,000 square-foot expansion to accommodate the growth of the company’s landing gear service area, accessory shop, instrument and avionics lab as well as an expanded machine shop and paint shop. The added space will bring the facility to approximately 60,000 square-feet.

Bial added that since 2009, Professional Aircraft Accessories has averaged about 90 completed ship sets of overhauled landing gear per year for various models of Bombardier aircraft.
